title: Tropical Oasis Escape Hidden in China’s Lush Rainforest
description: Escape to the luscious tropical climate of China’s jungle district with a stay at the tranquil InterContinental Xishuangbanna Resort, an IHG Hotel. Hidden within the balmy rainforest, this hotel is a secret oasis and the perfect destination for those wanting to embrace nature, spend time adventuring through the evergreen landscape, explore the culture and history of the ancient temples and indulge in peaceful relaxation by the lavish pools.
location_description: Intercontinental Xishuangbanna Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ronglin Blvd. Mannongfeng District, 2nd Phase, Tourism Area of Xishuangbanna, Jing Hong, Xishuangbanna, 666100, China

title: Tranquil Retreat in China's Lush Yunnan Province with Five Restaurants
description: Experience the perfect harmony of adventure and tranquillity at Anantara Xishuangbanna Resort, hidden among tropical gardens on Yunnan’s southernmost border. Embrace the serene surroundings with a rejuvenating onsite spa treatment or simply choose to luxuriate in the infinity pool or at the resort's five different restaurants. A day of exploring will see you journey through misty snow-capped mountains, learn of the rich culuture of various hill tribes and glimpse wild, roaming elephants.
offer_address: Menglun Town, Mengla County, Xishuangbanna, Yunnan Province 666303, China

title: Tropical Oasis in China's Forest Region
description: Discover calm and tranquillity at China’s Crowne Plaza Resort Xishuangbanna Parkview, an IHG Hotel, nestled among lush tropical gardens. Succumb to the gorgeous serenity of the property as you wander the pristine grounds or lounge poolside with a book in hand. An abundance of jungle treks will keep you entertained - venture through tea plantations and mingle with the charming locals, proud to highlight the beauty of their region.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Resort Xishuangbanna Parkview, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 88 Yingbin Road, Jinghong, Yunnan 666100, China
